content.title: Strassenverkehrsunfälle 2008 – Markanter Rückgang der Anzahl getöteter und verletzter Personen im Jahr 2008
content.lead: (BFS) - Im Jahr 2008 verloren 357 (2007: 384; -7%) Personen ihr Leben im Strassenverkehr. Die Zahl der schwer Verletzten sank auf 4'780 (2007: 5'235; -9%), die Zahl der leicht Verletzten auf 20'776 (2007: 21'897; -5%).

content.title: Accidents de la circulation routière en 2008 – Net recul du nombre des morts et de celui des blessés en 2008
content.lead: (OFS) - En 2008, 357 personnes (384 en 2007; -7%) ont perdu la vie dans un accident de la circulation routière. Le nombre des blessés graves a reculé à 4'780 (5'235 en 2007; -9%), celui des blessés légers à 20'776 (21'897 en 2007; -5%).

content.title: Incidenti della circolazione stradale 2008 – Notevole calo del numero di morti e feriti sulle strade
content.lead: (UST) - Nel 2008, hanno perso la vita in seguito a incidenti stradali 357 persone (2007: 384; -7%). Il numero dei feriti gravi è sceso a 4'780 (2007: 5'235; -9%) e quello di feriti leggeri a 20'776 (2007: 21'897; -5%).

content.title: Road accidents 2008 – Marked decline in the number of persons killed and injured in 2008
content.lead: (FSO) - In 2008, 357 people (2007: 384; -7%) were killed in road accidents. The number of those seriously injured fell to 4,780 (2007: 5,235; -9%) and the number of those with slight injuries to 20,776 (2007: 21'897; -5%). The number of persons killed has fallen considerably since the peak reached in the 1970s. A figure as low as the one observed last year had not been seen since the Second World War despite the fact that over the same period of time the population grew from approximately 4.5 to 7.7 million and the stock of passenger cars increased by a factor of 63 (from 63,000 to almost 4 million).
